body: Seeing Muramasa's mom (the short haired dark skinned elf) getting some action is always a treat since she didn't really get any in the actual original game. I really wish Nitroplus would do another full game with both of them, I need more Muramasa in my life and so far Kouki Kuu has been the only one to even try fill that gap left in wake of the original game though Halcon did good here even if it was brief.
